articles.description: The FairBreak Invitational Tournament is an innovative women's cricket tournament grouping established stars with emerging-nation players.
articles.content: The 'Pushpa' fever has hit women's cricket too now. After Ravindra Jadeja and Obed McCoy did the now-famous mode of celebration in the Indian Premier League (IPL) 2022, the FairBreak Invitational Tou… [+1649 chars]
